Question: In mid-1962 this person had left Sidcup Art College to devote himself to music and moved into a London flat with Jagger and Jones.
Hints: Ian Stewart says this person is the Rolling Stones band leader, while this person says his job is to be "oiling the machinery".
In August 2006 this person was granted a pardon by Arkansas governor Mike Huckabee for a 1975 reckless driving citation.
Since the 1980s this person has made more frequent guest appearances.
